SEARCH
Package proxy.service

Interface ChatBotService

All Known Implementing Classes:
ChatBotProxy
public interface ChatBotService
Interface representing the core service for interacting with a chatbot.

This interface provides methods for sending prompts, managing response limits, and tracking chatbot usage statistics.

Author:
jalenearmstrong
See Also:
  • Proxy Design Pattern

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    String
    generateResponse()
    Generates a response from the chatbot based on the current state or context.
    String
    getChatBotName()
    Retrieves the name of the chatbot.
    int
    getMessageLimit()
    Gets the limit on the number of messages the chatbot can process in a session.
    int
    getNumResponsesGenerated()
    Gets the total number of responses generated by the chatbot in the current session.
    int
    getTotalNumMessagesRemaining()
    Gets the total number of messages remaining before the chatbot reaches its limit for the session.
    int
    getTotalNumResponsesGenerated()
    Gets the total number of responses generated by the chatbot across all sessions.
    boolean
    limitReached()
    Checks if the chatbot has reached its message processing limit for the session.
    String
    prompt(String requestMessage)
    Sends a prompt to the chatbot and retrieves its response.

  • Method Details

    • generateResponse

      String generateResponse()
      Generates a response from the chatbot based on the current state or context.
      Returns:
      the chatbot's response as a String.

    • getChatBotName

      String getChatBotName()
      Retrieves the name of the chatbot.
      Returns:
      the name of the chatbot as a String.

    • getMessageLimit

      int getMessageLimit()
      Gets the limit on the number of messages the chatbot can process in a session.
      Returns:
      the maximum number of messages allowed.

    • getNumResponsesGenerated

      int getNumResponsesGenerated()
      Gets the total number of responses generated by the chatbot in the current session.
      Returns:
      the number of responses generated.

    • getTotalNumMessagesRemaining

      int getTotalNumMessagesRemaining()
      Gets the total number of messages remaining before the chatbot reaches its limit for the session.
      Returns:
      the number of messages remaining.

    • getTotalNumResponsesGenerated

      int getTotalNumResponsesGenerated()
      Gets the total number of responses generated by the chatbot across all sessions.
      Returns:
      the total number of responses generated.

    • limitReached

      boolean limitReached()
      Checks if the chatbot has reached its message processing limit for the session.
      Returns:
      true if the limit has been reached, false otherwise.

    • prompt

      String prompt(String requestMessage)
      Sends a prompt to the chatbot and retrieves its response.
      Parameters:
      requestMessage - the message to prompt the chatbot with.
      Returns:
      the chatbot's response as a String.
